Text: Enserco Energy Inc LC Address Info Cc Carol Sara The original Bank of America letter of credit number should be returned to Fortis Capital Corp ATTN Jonathan Fronda Three Stamford Plaza Tresser Blvd Stamford CT I am informed that a letter of cancellation signed by an authorized representative of Enron North America Corp should also accompany the original letter of credit and all amendments A facsimile of this cancellation letter is acceptable if transmitted to ATTN Jonathan Fronda A copy of the overnight courier air waybill should be attached to the facsimile I understand that Don Perkins has also started the process to confirm Fortis Capital Corp letter of credit number through the parent company Fortis Bank as well as making the correction we discussed earlier delivery of gas Please call me if you have any questions Thank you for your assistance in this matter Linn Evans Black Hills Corp PO Box Ninth St rd Fl Rapid City South Dakota T F C
